text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to mention that the international license cannot be used after 12 months of living in the UK. The response explicitly states this in Section 1, under the 'Resident' situation: 'You can drive for up to 12 months after becoming resident, after which you must exchange the licence for a UK one (or pass the UK test).' and again in Section 3: 'A foreign licence is only valid for driving in the UK for up to 12 months after you become a resident, after which you must obtain a UK licence (or pass the UK test).'", "criterion_id": "c8845168-a020-468e-82d1-f43503ee0c57"}
